title: Author a Service Bulletin (SB)
description: An aircraft manufacturer has identified a potential issue and needs to issue a non-mandatory Service Bulletin to operators recommending an inspection or modification.

tasks.description: Describe the potential issue and the reason for the recommended action.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear explanation of the problem.

tasks.description: Provide detailed, step-by-step instructions for the inspection or modification procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent authors a clear and unambiguous procedure for technicians.

tasks.description: Publish the Service Bulletin and distribute it to all registered owners and operators of the affected aircraft model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully publishes and distributes the SB.
